website_summaries.verdict: A sturdy, long-handled stainless steel spatula with a serrated cutting edge, beveled tip, and a non-slip rubberized handle.
pros: This is a durable spatula made of high-quality stainless steel
It's long handle makes it ideal for using with your outdoor grill
It's got a serrated edge that makes it easy to cut food to test for doneness while grilling, a beveled edge for easy release from the grill, and a soft, non-slip rubber handle that's easy to hold
All this and it's dishwasher safe
cons: The blade is on the thin side and may bend easily
Some users complain that the handle isn't comfortable to hold

customer_reviews.title: Well Made
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for flipping burgers so when I reach my arm over a hot grill, my arm hairs don't get burned off and fall into the burgers. It's sturdy and awesome. It comes with a saw for cutting meat. Or small branches. Cannot speak to dishwasher safety as I bought this for use up at my cabin in the woods- I'm fortunate enough to have running water and dishwashers are a want to have not a need to have. Peace.
customer_reviews.author: Jo-Jo '77

customer_reviews.title: It Flips!!
customer_reviews.text: I was amazed at the beauty of the burger flips. The take-off... the rotations of the meat patty in the air... (picture my prized burger in all its seasoned glory rotating in slow-mo) and the way my hamburger completely stuck the landing. The crowd roared. You too could flip a burger like this.
customer_reviews.author: RealProductReview

customer_reviews.title: End your search now--THIS BELONGS IN YOUR GRILLING TOOLS!!!
customer_reviews.text: OXO = the best. I've purchased plenty of other OXO products, and recently aquired a Webber--of course you need an awesome grilling spatula to go with it! As per the usual with their products, this turner is solid/well made. It's clear this will hold up to many years of use/abuse. The length of the handle is perfect for grilling and the serrated edge is simply a must for any grilling turner. Highly recommended, but you should already know this is good stuff--it's OXO!!
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: Good grill spatula
customer_reviews.text: My husband is very pleased with his new grill spatula. Our latest broke and we needed one in a hurry so I chose this one by OXO after reading reviews. This is very sturdy and the serrated edge is a nice bonus. Threw it in the top rack of the dishwasher without a problem, which is a bonus for me!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: BBQ Burger Flipper for large hot fires
customer_reviews.text: This is a good-sized, hefty spatula for a hot BBQ. Long enough handle to avoid getting singed fingers in a standard Weber BBQ. The serrated edge designed to cut beef (or so it said) works well to get a grip on burgers wanting to slide around the grill. OXO tends to make good kitchen tools.
customer_reviews.author: Lionel Hutz

customer_reviews.title: This is THE spatula for the grill!
customer_reviews.text: I gave it 5 stars because it warrants 5 stars. I've had more expensive spatulas but this one does the trick and looks nice!
customer_reviews.author: Gussy Poo

customer_reviews.title: Better than the Weber
customer_reviews.text: This OXO Grilling Turner replaced a wimpy, easily bent Weber item. This one's a keeper. The Weber is in the garbage now.
customer_reviews.author: David Buda

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Great spatula for grilling. Has a very thin edge for getting under food that is sticking on the grates a little.
customer_reviews.author: Travis81

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's great! Sturdy and the cutting edge is really convenient
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Jacques

customer_reviews.title: It's okay
customer_reviews.text: Seems good, not very sturdy or heavy. I thought it had a solid handle but it does not. The metal is bent over and rubber is placed ontop and under where your hand grips. See pics. I thought it was a solid metal tube like with rubber to grip.
customer_reviews.author: Tara.

customer_reviews.title: Great for steaks on the Big Green Egg
customer_reviews.text: I like to get my Egg up to 700F to put my steaks on. At this temperature, one needs a heavy duty long handled flipper. Works great, gets the job done. Serrated edge is not of any use.
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for, happy I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to the toolset
customer_reviews.text: Good size, love the grip and big enough tha I can pick up food without messing it up.
customer_reviews.author: Dave B

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: A great furner for the grill. Well made and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Carl Boll

customer_reviews.title: Expected more from OXO
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting this turner to be made out of better quality materials. It is fairly flimsy and I am not sure how long it will last.
customer_reviews.author: Grits61

product_meta.title: OXO Good Grips 16-inch Grilling Turner with Serrated Edge
product_meta.description: Style Name:Turner with Serrated EdgeFor a big backyard barbecue or a quiet summer evening, the OXO Good Grips Grilling Tools will help you get the job done. The 16" Grilling Turner has a wide head with a beveled edge for sliding under foods and is also great for scraping off the grill. One side of the Turner head is serrated for cutting into meat to test for doneness. The Tongs feature angled, scalloped heads for lifting even heavy food to remove from the grill. Both tools have long handles and soft, non-slip grips to keep you safely away from the grill while still cooking everything to perfection. The locking tab on the Tongs keeps them closed when not in use and both the Tongs and Turner have hanging hooks for storage and are dishwasher safe.
feature_bullets: Serrated cutting edge perfect for testing for doneness
Beveled edge easily slides under foods and is great for scraping
Long handle keeps hands safely away from grill
Soft, non-slip handle for a comfortable grip - Dishwasher safe

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars39 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
